channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 中央银行今日时事通讯中的量化紧缩初级读本注册 ⬇️ 目前为止进展顺利--但仍有很长的路要走 小国取得的进展最大，但在全球范围内却相形见绌
item.description:
A primer on Quantitative Tightening in the central banks newsletter today

Sign up ⬇️https://t.co/9W1LiN2e7a

- It has gone well so far
- But has a long way to go

Small countries have made most progress but their progress is dwarfed in the global picture pic.twitter.com/Keo96eiTZs

— Chris Giles (@ChrisGiles_) March 12, 2024

item.title: 经过两年的努力，我们终于说服了难以捉摸的 Telegram 首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）接受采访，他同意了，并自 2017 年以来首次在媒体上打破沉默。在第一篇文章中，我们谈到了 Telegram 的增长、货币化和潜在的 IPO：
item.description:
After two years of trying to persuade the elusive Telegram CEO Pavel Durov to sit for an interview, he agreed & broke his silence in the media for the 1st time since 2017.

In this 1st piece, we spoke about Telegram's growth, monetisation & potential IPO:https://t.co/FIzWTB4zkJ

— Hannah Murphy (@MsHannahMurphy) March 12, 2024

item.title: 意见：日本已经习惯了出生率下降和人口减少的无情故事。但最近的数字令人不安，要扭转这一局面，需要的不仅仅是经济激励措施
item.description:

item.title: 每个人都预期经济衰退已久，但它并没有出现：对世界经济的乐观情绪不断升温，企业盈利改善，推动股市屡创新高
item.description:
‘Everyone’s been anticipating a recession for a long time and it hasn’t materialised’: Growing optimism about the world economy and improved corporate earnings is driving stock markets to record highs https://t.co/URkQQv7pjj pic.twitter.com/6FeEkdiRxU

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在本周的专栏中，我写到了 "停电 "之夜，以及那些没有附带任何实际衡量*成功*标准的倡议的更广泛问题：
item.description:

item.title: 在农场动物开始疑似铅中毒死亡后，威尔士政府机构 NRW 资助了一项研究，探讨两者之间的联系。
item.description:
🚨Part 2/ 2 stories looking at human health risks posed by abandoned metal mines across Britain @FT

After farm animals started dying from suspected lead poisoning, the Welsh government body NRW funded a study to look at the link between the two.

🧵 https://t.co/X7o51YDvMk

— Laura Hughes (@Laura_K_Hughes) March 12, 2024

item.title: 爆炸性新闻：René Benko 的 Signa 集团旗下一家主要公司的债权人声称，该公司破产的原因是 "非法 "金融交易，而非欧洲房地产市场的低迷。
item.description:
Breaking news: Creditors of one of the main companies in René Benko’s Signa Group have alleged it fell into insolvency because of ‘illicit’ financial transactions, not a downturn in the European property market https://t.co/22pOMeDEwd pic.twitter.com/InXyp8AoVg

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一夜之间，俄罗斯至少有七个地区遭到乌克兰无人机袭击，这是近几个月来基辅在俄罗斯境内发动的范围最广的袭击。据报道，俄罗斯中部上空有二十多架无人机。
item.description:
At least seven regions across Russia were targeted overnight by Ukrainian drone strikes in the most wide-ranging attack inside Russia attributed to Kyiv in recent months. More than two dozen drones were reported over central Russia.
w/ @polinaivanovva @FThttps://t.co/7QHSwML2zN

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 12, 2024

item.title: 哲学家朱迪斯-巴特勒（Judith Butler）讲述了女性的定义、变性人的替罪羊问题以及为什么在人称代词上磕磕绊绊也没关系：
item.description:
'Queer and trans people would like to have ordinary lives, and not to be the focus of anxiety, fear, fantasy, terror, phobia.'

Philosopher Judith Butler on what defines a woman, the scapegoating of trans people and why it’s OK to stumble over pronouns: https://t.co/ASsltvU2Dm

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024
